alert.note: Alert for Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; Fresno-Clovis; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; Merced - Madera - Mendota; Planada - Le Grand - Snelling; Southeast San Joaquin Valley; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 14 at 9:29AM PST until January 14 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Visibilities in dense fog ranging from 800 feet to as low as 100 feet. * WHERE...Most of the San Joaquin Valley. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways affected include, but are not limited to Highway 198, Highway 41, Highway 43, Highway 180, Highway 152, and Highway 99 north of Bakersfield.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
